support.title: Need Help? We're Here for You
support.description: Our team is ready to assist with any technical issues or account questions.

faq.q: How do I reset my password?
faq.a: Click 'Forgot password' on the login page. You'll receive a reset link by email.

faq.q: How can I change my email address?
faq.a: Visit your account settings, click 'Change email', and follow the verification steps.

faq.q: How do I contact the support team?
faq.a: Use the contact form above or email us directly from the help center.
